name: Cockatoophonium (DB GJ 2018)
description:
For now, this is a little toy that lets you play a low octave on a MIDI Euphonium, while pretending to be a team of cockatoos. Controls to simulate 3 valves and the ability to blow at 2 different speeds. Follow the music on the left  and see if you can name the tune!

Controls with the keyboard either left or right-handed

Ian is ihorner@mastodon.social

Made for the Desert Bus 2018 Game Jam
Desert Bus For Hope is a charity gaming marathon.
More info can be found at desertbus.org
